charges.charge_description: 21:846=MD.F-CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA.21:846-Manufacture and possess with intent to distribute more than 100 marijuana plants. (8/19/11)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 150 months; SR: 4 years; SA:$100; Fine Waived.6/23/15-CBOP-SENTENCE REDUCED TO 135 MONTHS BUT NOT LESS THAN TIME SERVED. THE PREVIOUS TERM OF IMPRISONMENT WAS LESS THAN THE GUIDELINE RANGE APPLICABLE TO THE DEFENDANT AT THE TIME OF SENTENCE AS A RESULT OF A VARIANCE OTHER THAN FOR SUBSTANTIAL ASSISTANCE. AS SUCH, THE COURT CANNOT REDUCE THE DEFENDANT'S TERM OF IMPRISONMENT BELOW MINIMUM OF THE AMENDED GUIDELINE RANGE.
